    Method
    Description
    Patch
    Patch.rotate(int degree)
    Returns a new Patch instance with the grid rotated by a given degree.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Patch>
    Patchwork.getPlacedPieces()
    Returns a list of all placed pieces on the patchwork board.

    Method
    Description
    boolean
    Patchwork.addToPatchwork(Player player, Patch piece, int row, int col)
    Adds the given piece to the player's patchwork.
    int
    Patchwork.getPieceX(Patch piece)
    Returns the x-coordinate of the given piece on the patchwork board.

    Returns the y-coordinate of the given piece on the patchwork board.
    boolean

    Moves the given piece to a new position on the patchwork board.
    boolean
    Patchwork.openPatch(Patch patch)
    Checks if a given patch is available to be placed on the patchwork board.
    boolean
    Player.openPatch(Patch patch)
    Checks if a certain patch is available to the player.
    boolean
    Patch.patchOverlaps(Patch other)
    Checks if the patch overlaps with another patch.
